main event: A UFO was observed in New York, NY on June 12, 1954, traveling from southwest to northeast.
interesting points: The object was circular and approximately the size of a peach pit,It was metallic and had a silvery color,The UFO exhibited a maneuver pattern that included oscillating and swerving before disappearing suddenly,It was observed for about 10 to 15 seconds under clear sky conditions with no audible sound,Visibility at the time was between 15 and 20 miles.
witness description: 15 year old resident of New York
